name: Bitter Sweet Home
description:
After moving in a new home, a little girl meets a ghost. It's a errant soul who needs to recover his recollections. She gently agrees to help him. Guiding her is now up to you !

Unfortunately we didn't managed to complete the game in time.
The game stops on the second screen after you talked to the ghost.

To play the game, use the arrow keys to move and X to Talk and Validate menus.
